# contentDirection

**Instance Property**

The direction of the content in the chart.

## Declaration

```swift
var contentDirection: AXChartDescriptor.ContentDirection { get set }
```

## Specifying the content layout

- **contentFrame**: The bounds of the view, in screen coordinates, for visually rendering data values.
- **AXChartDescriptor.ContentDirection**: A constant that describes the content direction of the chart.
